long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspired by this BoingBoing article ( https://boingboing.net/2016/03/21/nyt-if-you-see-gibberish-on.html ), this extension does the following:

- replaces occurrences of "Encryption" with "Magic"
- replaces occurrences of "Encrypted" with "Enchanted"
- replaces occurrences of "Encrypt" with "Bewitch".

Source repo:
https://github.com/matthewoden/encryption-to-magic
